Studying the English language in an English-speaking country is the best but not the only way to learn the language. 
Do you agree or disagree with this statement?
text: Dialect is an integral part of communication and explore the culture. There are multifarious reasons why foreign nation is best to learn the international style. To illustrate, there are numbers of people who speak English in their regular life and they have more command on it so they can teach the learners with an effective way that how can they pronounce the word's, how can they get proficiently on the accent.
